GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.4.124
GSD.description:
net: dsa: mt7530: fix VLAN traffic leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.124 by commit 4fe4e1f48ba119bdbc7c897c83b04ba0d08f5488, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 83163f7dca5684816d01c8ccf4857aa74801e7b7. For more details please see the references link.
